workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: The workgroup_id with permission to build the vrf, the user must be a member of this workgroup.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

skip_cloud_provisioning.name: skip_cloud_provisioning
skip_cloud_provisioning.description: If editing an existing VRF specify the ID otherwise leave blank for new VRF.
skip_cloud_provisioning.validation_error_text: Parameter skip_cloud_provisioning only accepts integer numbers.

name.name: name
name.description: The workgroup_id with permission to build the vrf, the user must be a member of this workgroup.
name.validation_error_text: Parameter name only accepts printable characters. This excludes control characters like newlines, carrier return, and others.

vrf_id.name: vrf_id
vrf_id.description: If editing an existing VRF specify the ID otherwise leave blank for new VRF.
vrf_id.validation_error_text: Parameter vrf_id only accepts integer numbers.

description.name: description
description.validation_error_text: Parameter description only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

local_asn.name: local_asn
local_asn.description: The JSON blob describing all of the endpoints
local_asn.validation_error_text: Parameter local_asn only accepts integer numbers.

prefix_limit.name: prefix_limit
prefix_limit.description: Maximum prefix limit size for BGP peer routes
prefix_limit.validation_error_text: Parameter prefix_limit only accepts integer numbers.

endpoint.name: endpoint
endpoint.description: The JSON blob describing all of the endpoints
endpoint.validation_error_text: Parameter endpoint only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

name: provision
description: provision a new vrf on the network
